thread.title: ASUS Zenfone Selfie now available in India
thread.title_full: ASUS Zenfone Selfie now available in India

author: Deccan
title: ASUS Zenfone Selfie now available in India
text:
Deccan Chronicle | September 15, 2015, 18.44 pm The new ASUS Zenfone Selfie features a 13MP camera After having launched the Zenfone Selfie amongst much fanfare at Zen Festival last month, ASUS has confirmed the availability of its latest Zenfone Selfie online on Flipkart, starting today. Zenfone Selfie’s front-facing PixelMaster camera has a huge 13MP resolution and an f/2.2-aperture, 88-degree wide-angle lens to capture more of every smile. With the unique Selfie Panorama mode, you’re able to shoot Selfies with an outlook of up to 140 degrees.
Zenfone Selfie’s rear camera is just as advanced, with a large f/2.0 aperture lens for superb low-light shots. Both cameras are engineered with five-prism Largan lenses and top-quality Toshiba sensors, and include dual-LED Real Tone flash technology for perfect illumination in any lighting conditions.
You’ll also enjoy macro photography that works on subjects as close to 6cm, plus laser auto-focusing that’s as quick as 0.2 second. Clicking the right Selfies is now easy! Zenfone Selfie a 5.5-inch smartphone features an industry’s first octa-core, 64-bit processor with Qualcomm’s Snapdragon 615. With its superb performance and superior power-efficiency coupled with a massive 3GB of fast memory, users can shoot sharp photographs at stupefying speed.
Key features:
Super-fast Wi-Fi: Upto 433 Mbps download speed,6X data speed Corning Gorilla Glass 4: The protection shield with 85% less chance to break 300mAh Battery Sonic Master 2.0: Light speed photography: Auto focus technology is 2X faster than traditional contrast focus; 3X faster in short range and 2X faster focus in low light environment Priced at Rs 17,999, Zenfone Selfie is available in three colours on Flipkart— Pure White, Chic Pink and Aqua Blue.
